name: Free Online Seal Forgery Suspicion Detector - ATools
description: Free online seal forgery suspicion detector: Heuristic analysis of red seals based on pixel features, outputs suspicion score and mask preview (for reference only).
seoDescription: Free online seal forgery suspicion detector that supports uploading scanned documents/screenshots and performs pixel-level heuristic analysis on red seal areas, analyzing features such as connected components, boundary complexity, and color dispersion to provide suspicion scores and mask previews. Pure frontend local operation without image uploads, results are for reference only and should be combined with original documents and business processes for comprehensive judgment.

ui.title: Seal Forgery Suspicion Detector
ui.explanation: Note: This tool detects possible forgery traces by analyzing geometric features and color distribution of seals.
ui.noSealDetected: No obvious seal area detected (may not be a red seal/background complex/insufficient clarity).
ui.referenceHint: Reference: Higher number of components/boundary complexity/hue dispersion increases likelihood of cutout splicing or secondary processing traces.
ui.highRiskHint: High suspicion: Recommended to combine original scans, different resolution versions with professional forensics tools for further verification.
ui.mediumRiskHint: Medium suspicion: Possible secondary processing, compression or background interference; recommended to compare with source files and originals.
ui.lowRiskHint: Low suspicion: No obvious abnormal features detected (for reference only).
ui.detailedExplanation: Note: This is a heuristic 'suspicion' detection based on pixel features, not equivalent to forensic identification results. Strongly recommended to use results as reference clues and combine with original documents, scanning processes and signature system logs for comprehensive judgment.
